Documentation

Personal documentation for operations I complete infrequently enough that the documentation helps.

Cloning This Webiste & Getting Set-up for Development with Eleventy

A quick guide for cloning this site's repository via git & getting set up for development on a new system. I use Eleventy (11ty) as a static site generator & Airtable as a sort of a CMS solution. This documentation will walk through cloning this website's repository from GitHub, installing all required dependencies, insuring all NPM plugins are installed, and testing to ensure that the new machine is ready for further development.
